title: Sound Slider
description: Drag a slider to blend sounds into words, giving children kinesthetic control over the blending process and making abstract phonics concepts concrete.
creator: Claude AI
subject: Reading
Phonics
Blending
Kinesthetic Learning
learningObjectives: Recall individual phonemes in CVC words
Explain that blending is combining sounds smoothly
Control blending pace to decode words
Compare slow segmented sounds to smooth blending

controls.label: Sound Slider
controls.description: Drag to blend sounds - slow for segmented, fast for blended

assumptions: User can drag slider with mouse or touch
User is learning to blend sounds
limitations: Slider precision may vary on touch devices
Speech synthesis timing may vary by browser
